snippet.title: Pip My Dice - Official Trailer
snippet.description:
Wishlist the game now! 
https://store.steampowered.com/app/2797650

Join the discord server:
https://discord.gg/K5ZsFpe6uB

Pip My Dice is a Yahtzee Roguelike experience. Score enough to make it to the next level, customize your dice to score more and collect relics to create unlimited combos! Collect money through the rounds to buy new dice, relics, and customizers to upgrade your dice. Enjoy a new run every time!
